name: SCRPDS: SpaceCraft Remote Power Distribution Services
name_original: SCRPDS: SpaceCraft Remote Power Distribution Services
description:
"Making the mundane meaningless."  

Welcome new Unit!! 

SCRPDS is happy to have you join us as we help improve space travel one ship at a time. Your job is to distribute power where it is needed and reboot broken systems if necessary. Sounds too easy? Well it sure is! Easy work, great connections, friendly community, and many experiences are all part of SCRPDS.
